data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module has subroutines in Perl and corresponding functions in
    Acrobat JavaScript to encrypt and decrypt data transferred between
    Perl and a PDF-document and back to Perl. There is also a
    subroutine/function in both languages to create the keys used for
    the scrambling.

    It should be fairly difficult to crack the keys, so you should get
    some sort of privacy for your data, without paying huge sums for it.
